name: Indian Fry Bread
author: Stargazer42
summary: This crisp and bubbly bread is wonderful for Indian tacos or served as a dessert with powdered sugar or sugar and cinnamon. We put refried beans, Mexican-seasoned ground beef, grated cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, black olives, salsa, and sour cream on top to make a great main dish for dinner.
directions: Combine flour, baking powder, and salt in a bowl
Stir in cold water and vegetable oil until dough comes together into a ball
Set dough on a floured surface
Pinch off ten pieces the size of golf balls, roll into balls, and flatten each into a round
Make a small hole in the center of each round
Fill a deep skillet with oil to 3/4 inch; heat over medium-high heat
Add dough rounds in batches and fry until golden brown, about 20 seconds per side
